address_id.description: A unique identifier associated with the address of the building at which the upgrade(s) will be installed. This id must be obtained using the address-service endpoint.
address_id.title: Address id

applicant_id.description: This identifier is unique to the applicant (the building owner or renter that is to benefit from the rebate). It must be obtained from the API /applicant endpoint.
applicant_id.title: Applicant id

building_project_type.title: Building project type
building_project_type.description: This describes both the type of the building and, in the multifamily case, whether this reservation applies to the whole building or to a single unit. For the MULTIFAMILY_CENTRAL case, the income bucket for the building, mf_income_bucket, is used. Otherwise, the income bucket for the dwelling unit, dwelling_unit_income_bucket, is used.

claimant_payment.description: This is the amount that the state paid to an aggregator, or other claimant, for a HOMES rebate.
claimant_payment.title: Claimant payment

claimant_type.title: Claimant type
claimant_type.description: The type of person or entity that is initiating the rebate process on behalf of the applicant.

construction_type.title: Construction type
construction_type.description: Set to NEW if the building is less than one year old. Otherwise, set to EXISTING.

contractor_company_name.title: Contractor company name
contractor_company_name.description: The name of the primary contracting company for the project.

contractor_dac_incentive.description: This is the amount the state will pay to a contractor as a disadvantaged-community incentive. This field is required if the address of the building is within a DAC.
contractor_dac_incentive.title: Contractor DAC incentive

contractor_name.title: Contractor name
contractor_name.description: The name of the primary contractor for the project.

doe_approved_bpi_2400_compliant_software.title: DOE approved bpi 2400 compliant software used
doe_approved_bpi_2400_compliant_software.description: This field is required when *rebate_type* is MODELED. Otherwise, this field should be omitted. A list of approved software will be publicly available along with the corresponding string that should be used here. We use a string rather than an enum because the approved list may change often.

dwelling_unit_income_bucket.title: Dwelling unit income bucket
dwelling_unit_income_bucket.description: The household income level of the applicant compared to the area median income (AMI).

equipment_and_material_cost.title: Equipment and material cost
equipment_and_material_cost.description: The total cost of the equipment and materials purchased as part of a redemption.

estimated_post_retrofit_energy_usage_kwh.title: Estimated post retrofit energy usage kwh equivalent
estimated_post_retrofit_energy_usage_kwh.description: The total estimated (expected) annual  energy usage converted to kWh-equivalent for the home or multifamily building post-retrofit. This field is used for MEASURED reservations only.

external_rebate_id.title: External rebate id
external_rebate_id.description: This is an optional field that a state can use for their own purposes to identify a rebate or rebate reservation.

installation_cost.description: The installation costs associated with this redemption. To qualify, the installation must be performed by an approved contractor. Also see `is_contractor_eligible`.
installation_cost.title: Installation cost

is_contractor_eligible.description: The contractor is eligible if they are on the state's approved list.
is_contractor_eligible.title: Is contractor eligible

is_disadvantaged_community.description: This field should only be used by states that have been approved by the DOE to do so. If provided, this will override the is_disadvantaged_community value from the address-service.
is_disadvantaged_community.title: Is disadvantaged community

measured_post_retrofit_energy_usage_kwh_.title: Measured post retrofit energy usage kwh equivalent
measured_post_retrofit_energy_usage_kwh_.description: The total actual annual energy usage converted to kWh-equivalent for the home or multifamily building post-retrofit - based on normalized utility bill data. This field is used for MEASURED redemptions only.

measured_pre_retrofit_energy_usage_kwh_e.title: Measured pre-retrofit energy usage kwh equivalent
measured_pre_retrofit_energy_usage_kwh_e.description: The total actual annual energy usage converted to kWh-equivalent for the home or multifamily building prior to the retrofit - based on normalized utility bill data. This field is used for MEASURED reservations only.

mf_building_income_bucket.title: Multifamily building income bucket
mf_building_income_bucket.description: Choose the lowest area median income (AMI) range for which at least 50% of the household units fall into the range or lower. For example, consider a five-unit apartment building for which two units fall in the `LESS_THAN_80%_AMI` range and three fall in the `80%_AMI_AND_GREATER`. Then the `80%_AMI_AND_GREATER` range should be chosen because more than half of the units fall into this range or lower.

modeled_post_retrofit_energy_usage_kwh_e.title: Modeled post retrofit energy usage kwh equivalent
modeled_post_retrofit_energy_usage_kwh_e.description: The total annual modeled energy usage converted to kWh-equivalent for the home or multifamily building post-retrofit. This field is used for MODELED reservations only.

modeled_pre_retrofit_energy_usage_kwh_eq.title: Modeled pre energy usage kwh equivalent
modeled_pre_retrofit_energy_usage_kwh_eq.description: The total annual modeled energy usage converted to kWh-equivalent for the home or multifamily building as-found (prior to the retrofit). This field is used for MODELED reservations only.

num_units.title: Num units
num_units.description: This is the total number of units in a multifamily building. This field is required when *building_project_type* is any of the enumerated values that has a "MULTIFAMILY" prefix. Otherwise, the field should be omitted.

num_units_meeting_income_bucket.title: Num units meeting income bucket
num_units_meeting_income_bucket.description: This is the number of units in a multifamily building for which the household income falls within the income range represented by *mf_income_bucket* or is lower.

portfolio_id.description: Multiple reservations for MEASURED HOMES projects can be tied together into a portfolio by assigning the same portfolio_id value to each reservation in the portfolio.
portfolio_id.title: Portfolio id

project_id.description: This is a unique string supplied by the API user that is used to associate one or more reservations to a single project. Note: it is recommended that a uuid be used to avoid duplication, but the API user can use any other system that they find convenient, provided that it is unique for the state.
project_id.title: Project id

project_completion_date.title: Project completion date
project_completion_date.description: This is a calendar date in the form YYYY-MM-DD. Time zone is immaterial.

rebate_deducted.title: Rebate deducted
rebate_deducted.description: This is the amount that was deducted from the customer's/homeowner's purchase price or invoiced amount for products and/or installation.

rebate_type.title: Rebate type
rebate_type.description: The HOMES rebates have two distinct options for determining savings and rebate amounts, MODELED vs MEASURED.

reservation_amount.title: Reservation amount
reservation_amount.description: This is the maximum rebate amount.

ambient_co_test_result.description: Testing is only required if the home has one or more combustion appliances post-retrofit.
ambient_co_test_result.title: Ambient CO test result

gas_leak_detection_test_result.description: Testing is only required if the home has one or more combustion appliances post-retrofit.
gas_leak_detection_test_result.title: Ambient CO test result

signs_of_mold_or_moisture.description: Contractor should not proceed with energy efficiency measures until mold and moisture issues are mitigated.
signs_of_mold_or_moisture.title: ASHRAE 62.2 ventilation calculated

spillage_test_result.description: Testing is only required if the home has one or more combustion appliances post-retrofit.
spillage_test_result.title: Ambient CO test result

undiluted_co_test_result.description: Testing is only required if the home has one or more combustion appliances post-retrofit.
undiluted_co_test_result.title: Ambient CO test result

venting_test_result.description: Testing is only required if the home has one or more combustion appliances post-retrofit.
venting_test_result.title: Ambient CO test result

software_used_to_estimate_post_retrofit_.title: Software used to estimate measured savings
software_used_to_estimate_post_retrofit_.description: This field is required when `rebate_type` is `MEASURED`.

state_attests_proof_of_identity_ownershi.title: State attests proof of identity ownership income
state_attests_proof_of_identity_ownershi.description: The state attests that they have obtained the required proof of identify, proof of ownership, and proof of income for this rebate.

state_attests_any_failed_inspection_reme.title: State attests any failed inspection remediated

unit_name_or_number.title: Unit name or number
unit_name_or_number.description: This is the unit designator for a unit in a multifamily building. Do NOT include words or abbreviations such as 'APT' or 'UNIT'. For example, if the unit is referred to as 'APT 7B', then *unit_name_or_number* should be '7B'.

upgrades.title: Homes upgrades
upgrades.description: List all the upgrades from the enumeration that apply to the HOMES project.

vendor_id.title: Vendor id
vendor_id.description: This is a unique identifier for a vendor that the state will reimburse in connection with a redemption.

allOf.$comment: Determine when portfolio_id is required or not allowed
Determine which fields are required or not allowed when rebate_type is MODELED or MEASURED
Determine which fields are required or not allowed when building_project_type is MULTIFAMILY_IN_UNIT
Determine which fields are required or not allowed when building_project_type is MULTIFAMILY_CENTRAL
Determine which fields are required or not allowed for single family building_project_type
